fields.Title: SEAFORT INT / AFTERDOLORES TALK
fields.Description: Load to this from dream seafort dolores dei dialogue end.

fields.Title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's comb the entire island, centimetre by centimetre. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

fields.Title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's get back to the mainland. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Get the fuck out of here. Fuck this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Get the fuck out of here. Fuck this place, fuck this world, fuck this life, fuck this body -- just fucking go.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah. About the job.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah. About the job."

fields.Title: You: ""Let's solve the fucking case.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's solve the fucking case."

fields.Title: You: ""Actually -- it was total annihilat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually -- it was total annihilation, Kim."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "The sheets are stained red. Your bl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sheets are stained red. Your blood's been running again. Keep it together. Just get out of here and finish this fucking thing.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah. No biggie, don't shit yourse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah. No biggie, don't shit yourself. All the worst dreams are about bitches -- you wouldn't *believe* the shit Cuno sees about C..."

fields.Title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's get that motive out of our perp. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.extract_a_motive"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.extract_a_motive_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.inspect_the_phasmid"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""My sleep was deep and invigorating..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My sleep was deep and invigorating." (Try to cover up the blood seeping out with your hands.)
fields.Alternate1: "My sleep was deep and invigorating." (Desperately try to cover up all the blood seeping out with your hands.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you sure you're okay? You thra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you sure you're okay? You thrashed around, then you bolted up, half-covered in blood from your wound."
fields.Alternate1: "Are you sure you're okay? You thrashed around, then you bolted up, halfway covered in blood from your wounds."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't worry, detective. We've solv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't worry, detective. We've solved the case. It's wrapped and done." He looks north. "Are you ready?"

fields.Title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's get our perp to confess to the murder. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.extract_a_confession"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.extract_a_confession_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.inspect_the_phasmid"] == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He frowns. "I did not want to wake..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He frowns. "I did not want to wake you -- perhaps I should have? Was it a job dream?"

fields.Title: You: ""No, an ex-wife dream.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, an ex-wife dream."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Cuno knows that shit. All the wors..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cuno knows that shit. All the worst dreams are about bitches -- you wouldn't *believe* the shit Cuno sees about C..."

fields.Title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's investigate that gigantic insect. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're up quick... How was your sl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're up quick... How was your sleep?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "However bad it is, pig, we go on, d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: However bad it is, pig, we go on, deputy Cuno thinks. We detect. There's nothing more.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We already solved the case, rememb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We already solved the case, remember? You were sleeping."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay," he replies simply."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay," he replies simply.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Right. Pig takes it like a man. Go..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right. Pig takes it like a man. Good for you. Bitches always tryna' damage you with *psi* weapons. *Psi* style -- you wouldn't *believe* the shit Cuno sees about C..."

fields.Title: You: ""Cuno... I had this..." (Shake your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cuno... I had this..." (Shake your head) "Fucking dream..."

fields.Title: You: "Just grunt in pain."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just grunt in pain.

fields.Title: You: ""So I talked in my sleep?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So I talked in my sleep?"

fields.Title: You: "Just spit out the blood and get bac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just spit out the blood and get back to work. You're bad ass like that.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course. I was just thinking may..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course. I was just thinking maybe you've torn your stitches... Are you ready to move on?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods solemnly."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods solemnly.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Now let's get this shit back on th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now let's get this shit back on the road, yo. Just make sure you don't die." He glances at your blood-covered hands. "Cuno's no fucking mortician."

fields.Title: You: ""Fuck it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck it."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Whoa there, man. You've been squea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whoa there, man. You've been squealing and thrashing around, crazy. And now -- you're bleeding too... again." He stares in awe at the streaks of blood covering your body.

fields.Title: You: ""How did you know?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How did you know?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Sure, sure. That's why you mumbled..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure, sure. That's why you mumbled about bitches. Real fine."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm fine, really." (Try to cover u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm fine, really." (Try to cover up the blood seeping out with your hands.) "I'm super mega fine."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm fine, really." (Try to cover up the blood seeping out with your hand.)

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Your surroundings are undisturbed...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your surroundings are undisturbed. While you slept, you were alone. Now that you're awake -- you're still alone.

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's still worried. You must have r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's still worried. You must have really thrashed and squealed in your sleep.

fields.Title: Volition: "Harry... I know there's not much to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Harry... I know there's not much to say -- but if nothing else, just remember that you've made it this far. And it's just a bit farther now. Let's finish this.

fields.Title: Empathy: "It's not good, this C in his dreams..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not good, this C in his dreams.

fields.Title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's arrest the perp. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You thrashed around, then you bolt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You thrashed around, then you bolted up, half-covered in blood from your wound. Are you okay?"
fields.Alternate1: "You thrashed around, then you bolted up, half-covered in blood from your wounds. Are you okay?"

fields.Title: You: "(Swallow the blood and conclude.) "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Swallow the blood and conclude.) "Let's talk to our perp again. That's the next step in the *task chain*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course," the lieutenant nods. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course," the lieutenant nods. "You ready?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't worry, detective. We'll solv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't worry, detective. We'll solve the case. Are you ready?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "I understand -- we've all been thro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I understand -- we've all been through similar things. It can be overcome.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yeah, Cuno saw that. A nightmare a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, Cuno saw that. A nightmare about bitches."
